message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 60/40 in favor of Alice.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fairer. Let's see if you agree.
Considering inflation, I've adjusted my offer. Let's try a 52.5/47.5 split in favor of Alice.
I'm willing to compromise a bit. Let's go with a 55/45 split, still in my favor, but closer to your last offer.
